Pre-Game Insights: India will face South Africa in the T20 World Cup 2024 final
India won the inaugural title in 2007, while South Africa have reached a World Cup final for the first time in history
Others: The T20 World Cup 2024 final will take place on Saturday, June 29 2024
The grand final of the T20 World Cup 2024 will be played at the Kensington Oval in Bridgetown, Barbados
